mapper.select: SELECT I00008.CHUUBUNSHONO AS KKOJOUHOUICHIRAN_CHUUBUNSHONO1 ,I00008.SHUTSUNYUUKOJIKAN AS UHOUICHIRAN_SHUTSUNYUUKOJIKAN2 ,I00008.SHUTSUNYUUKOJOUTAI AS HOUICHIRAN_SHUTSUNYUUKOJOUTAI3 ,I00008.SHOUHINMEISHOU AS OJOUHOUICHIRAN_SHOUHINMEISHOU4 ,I00008.KAISHAMEI AS SHUKKOJOUHOUICHIRAN_KAISHAMEI5 ,I00008.TAN_I AS UUKOSHUKKOJOUHOUICHIRAN_TAN_I6 ,I00008.SUURYOU AS KOSHUKKOJOUHOUICHIRAN_SUURYOU7 ,I00008.PRICE AS UUKOSHUKKOJOUHOUICHIRAN_TANKA8 ,I00008.GOUKEI AS UKOSHUKKOJOUHOUICHIRAN_GOUKEI9 FROM I00008 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CASE WHEN #{KAISHAMEI} IS NULL OR #{KAISHAMEI} = '' THEN 1 = 1 ELSE I00008.KAISHAMEI = #{KAISHAMEI} END AND CASE WHEN #{SHOUHINMEI} IS NULL OR #{SHOUHINMEI} = '' THEN 1 = 1 ELSE I00008.SHOUHINMEISHOU = #{SHOUHINMEI} END
